projectDescription: A simple web-based system for collecting contract information from cast and crew. Staff fills in the deal terms, sends a unique link to each person to complete their personal details, then downloads the finished PDF to attach to DocuSign.
internalNotes: V2 of proposal — simplified significantly per client feedback. Client was using Google Docs but got locked out due to multi-location access. 50-60 contracts per project. Two form types: Cast Contract and Crew Deal Memo. Staff fills back-office fields first, then sends unique link to talent/crew to complete personal info. No DocuSign API needed — just PDF download. Single shared admin password.

projectSpecifics:
## How It Works

### Step 1 — Staff Creates a Contract
Staff logs into the admin dashboard and creates a new contract entry by selecting the project, contract type (Cast or Crew), and filling in the deal terms:
- **Compensation** (amount, currency MXN/USD, pay period)
- **Profit Participation %**
- **Rentals** (if applicable)
- **Loan-Out Company, Phone & Address** (if applicable)
- **Start Date & End Date**
- **Screen Credit**
- **Crew Title** (Crew) or **Role** (Cast)

### Step 2 — Person Completes Their Info
The system generates a unique link for each person. No login required — they click the link and fill in:
- **Full Name** (Nombre, Apellido paterno, Apellido materno)
- **Address**
- **Phone & WhatsApp**
- **Email**
- **Emergency Contact & Phone**
- **Bank Account & CLABE** (two full lines for long Mexican banking numbers)

### Step 3 — Download PDF
Once the person submits their info, the contract is marked complete on the dashboard. Staff can download the finished PDF and attach it to the DocuSign envelope.

## Admin Dashboard

- **Password-protected** login for staff
- **All contracts at a glance** — organized by project, showing each person's name, contract type, and status
- **Status indicators:** Pending (link sent, waiting on person), Complete (ready for PDF download)
- **PDF download** button for completed contracts
- **Create new contracts** with project selection and deal terms
exclusions:
- Full legal contract content (this system generates the cover page only — the remaining contract pages are your existing templates)
- DocuSign integration or automation (PDFs are downloaded and manually attached to DocuSign)
- Content creation or contract language review
- Ongoing contract template modifications after launch (can be quoted separately)
